    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public boolean apply(T[] a,
                     int start,
                     int end)
        Sorts a portion of the array of objects according to the given order (it does not creates a new array)
        Specified by:
        apply in class Sort<T>
        Parameters:
        a - Array of objects to be sorted
        start - Initial position in the array to be sorted
        end - Final position in the array to be sorte
        Returns:
        true If the sorting process was done without fails, false otherwise
